nodes.text: Nicki was an Ewok who lived in Bright Tree Village on the forest moon of Endor.

Nicki was an Ewok who lived on the forest moon of Endor during the Galactic Civil War. Nicki was part of the tribe of Bright Tree Village and was present when a Rebel strike team led by General Han Solo was brought to the village by members of the tribe. When the protocol droid C-3PO told stories about the Rebels' adventures during the war, Nicki was present to hear the tale. Nicki was later present in the Bright Tree Village celebration commemorating the Rebel victory after the Battle of Endor. During the celebration, Nicki danced with Wicket W. Warrick.
Nicki appeared in the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The character was portrayed by Nicholas Read, who was credited in Return of the Jedi as Nicki Reade.
